headline: No, Mr. President, It Does Matter
abstract: Trump has no clear rationale for killing Iran’s top general, or for much of his foreign policy.
lead_paragraph: After millions of Iranians turned out to mourn the American assassination of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani, it was surprising, and heartening, to see Iranian students bravely protesting their government’s accidental downing of a Ukrainian jetliner.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
